name: Pennywell Arcade
description:
Enter Pennywell Arcade, an immersive coin-operated arcade featuring classic arcade machines and a unique twist on the classic Pac-Man. Shoot some targets in the shooting range, make some baskets in the basketball game, play some Slime Heist in on a screen or dive in and run around the maze yourself! Compete with your friends for the high scores!

Developed as my final year solo project. Below you can see the project initiation document, which covers the initial plan for the project including objectives, time scale and risks, and my final report, which is a full analysis and breakdown of the game, including the steps I took through development, my research, and how I felt the game turned out.

Project Initiation Document: https://goo.gl/JFfp8Y

Final Report: https://goo.gl/GRtfkt
